description: Negotiate effectively and fairly to make 1000s more than they would otherwise. Be confident in starting and finishing a negotiation. Use smart tactics to increase their bargaining power. Develop mental and emotional strength to keep pushing until they get a great price. Use negotiating skills in both personal and professional situations
